text: 4.8 Sng 37.4, Mat 6.33, Lom 8.28, Kol 2.23, 1 Ti 6.6 Binɨb kasek aplan apyan gɨpal okok, mubwak kɨles kɨli sɨkol olap mɨdek gɨpal ak pen, binɨb God anɨgup tek nɨŋɨd, kɨles gɨl gel amub okok, kɨlop gek mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel. Anɨgel, God takaw aglup ak anɨgɨl agup, Mɨñɨl mɨdtep gɨl, kɨdek mɨdtep gɨl gɨnɨgabal agup.
